issue.title: daddylive.mp
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://daddylive.mp/embed/stream-1.php](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdaddylive.mp%2Fembed%2Fstream-1.php) ### Comment > From the uBO side, same ad system fast popups are blocked. I guess this generic filter rule block the fast popups, As you can see the `Screenshot 2` > > ```adblock > /^https?:\/\/[a-z]{8,15}\.com\/$/$xhr,3p,method=head,header=access-control-expose-headers:/X-DirectionPartner-Id/,to=com > ``` > > So it would be better to add a filter rule similar to this. > > ------ > There are more, but I didn't add them because they were blocked as direct links and they are temporary links. > > ``` > 1. https://4kstreams.shop/tv/stream-1.php > 2. https://sportstreamslife.shop/player/stream-1.php > 3. https://ripplestream4u.shop/casting/stream-1.php > 4. https://liveworld.shop/embed/stream-1.php > 5. https://topstreamz.shop/play/stream-1.php > 6. https://thesport.lol/live/stream-1.php > 7. https://pandastreamz.shop/player/stream-1.php > 8. https://reddit-streams.pro/raz/1.php > 9. https://foreverquote.xyz/brkt/t1.php?=ch1 > 10. https://alexsports.lat/HD/1.php > 11. https://footballstreams.lol/embed/stream-1.php > ``` Username: `@kodiakhub` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/17vhxpkgrhmo0gk0osw4s4oc40gsgosap84u7j6j7s.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/icxwa37ito8wwkwg8wgg4sgsk4sgo0ctioqru54n00.png?nc=1)
